title: Home
text:
This website serves as a guide for setting up a media server with Jellyfin.
Jellyfin is a free and open source media server that allows you to easily navigate your media, such as movies, TV shows, music, photos, and e-books.
Included in this guide is information about choosing hardware and an operating system, setting up the server, configuring remote access, advanced server configuration, automated account management, and adding live TV.

title: About
text: This site was created for my CSC-475 project at Furman University. The purpose of this site is to provide a guide on how to set up a media server using Jellyfin, allowing worldwide access to media stored at home. This information is a culmination of over a year and a half of personal experimentation, troubleshooting, and browsing forums.
